intro: Tabernaemontana celebica, commonly known as the Celebes star jasmine, is a flowering plant native to Indonesia. It belongs to the Apocynaceae family and is characterized by its fragrant, star-shaped white flowers. The plant has opposite, ovate leaves that are usually glossy and dark green. It thrives in warm, humid climates and is often cultivated for its ornamental value. Its flowers bloom in clusters and emit a sweet, intoxicating fragrance, especially at night.
